title: Aasa Patta Ellathayum Lyrics Viyabari
stanzas:
aasa patta ellaathaiyum
kaasu irundha vaangalaam
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?
neeyum
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?

aayiram uravu unna
thaedi vandhe ninnaalum
thaai pole
thaanga mudiyuma?

unnaiyum ennaiyum
padaichathinge yaaruda
deivam ovvoru veettilum
irukkuthunaa thaaiyadaa

aasa patta ellaathaiyum
kaasu irundha vaangalaam
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?
neeyum
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?

pattiniya kedanthaalum
pillaiku paal koduppaa
paal kudikkum pilla mugam
paathu pasi marappaa

ilavattam aana pinnum
ennai thaechi kulikkavaipa
uchi mudham padham vara
uchukotti magizhnthiduva

nenjile nadakkavaippa
nilava pudikkavaippa
pinju viral nagam kadippaa
pillaiecha soru thinbaa

pallu mulaika nellu mudiya
mella mellathaan keerividuvaa

unnaiyum ennaiyum
padaichathinge yaaruda
deivam ovvoru veettilum
irukkuthunaa thaaiyadaa

aasa patta ellaathaiyum
kaasu irundha vaangalaam
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?
nee
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?

mannil oru chedi mulaicha
mannukathu prasavam thaan.
unnai pera thudithudichaa
annaikathu boogambamthaan

sooriyana suthikitte
thannai suthum boomiyamma
pethedutha pillai suthi
pithukollum thaaimaiyammaa

garpathil nelintha unnai
nutpamaai thottu rasippa
pedhai pol aval iruppaa
medhaiyaai unai valarppaa

enna vendum ini unakku
annai madiyil sorgam irukku.

unnaiyum ennaiyum
padaichathinge yaaruda
deivam ovvoru veettilum
irukkuthunaa thaaiyadaa

aasa patta ellaathaiyum
kaasu irundha vaangalaam
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?
neeyum
ammaava vaanga mudiyuma?

aayiram uravu unna
thaedi vandhe ninnaalum
thaai pole
thaanga mudiyuma?

unnaiyum ennaiyum
padaichathinge yaaruda
deivam ovvoru veettilum
irukkuthunaa thaaiyadaa
